snippet: New ties between Boko Haram and the Islamic State have reinforced American and European concerns that have led to the training of African troops.
abstract: Nigeria-based militant group Boko Haram says it has pledged allegiance to Islamic State, claim that Western counterterrorism officials say appears to be legitimate; pledge of allegiance adds new urgency to American and allied commanders' training of African counterterrorism troops in Chad, which was organized due to Boko Haram's previous activities.
lead_paragraph: New ties between Boko Haram and the Islamic State have reinforced American and European concerns that have led to the training of African troops.
